series_title: Smart Tag/EZ Pass Customer Account Toll Transaction Summaries
series_description: This series documents summary data of customer transactions in the Customer Accounts database such as account numbers and toll amounts. This series may include, but is not limited to: customer quarterly statements.

series_title: Smart Tag/EZ Pass Customer Account Toll Transactions
series_description: This series documents customer toll transactions and activities including tag and toll locations, and time and amount debited. This series may include, but is not to: transaction tables.
retention_statement: 0 Years after no longer administratively useful

series_title: Smart Tag/EZ Pass Customer Accounts Applications
series_description: This series documents Smart Tag/EZ Pass applications that includes customer name, address, telephone number, vehicle information, and method of payment. This series may include, but is not limited to: applications.
